abstract: Oceana, a conservation organization based in Washington, ties a new ad campaign to the one-year anniversary of the BP oil spill.
snippet: Oceana, a conservation organization based in Washington, ties a new ad campaign to the one-year anniversary of the BP oil spill.
lead_paragraph: A book by Sinclair Lewis that was published in 1935 has been largely forgotten, except for its chilling title, “It Can’t Happen Here.” That idea provides the premise for a campaign for an advocacy organization that is tied to the one-year anniversary of the BP oil spill.

headline.main: BP Accident Lives On in Ads
